sn56.129-130:4.1: … “Evameva kho, bhikkhave, appakā te sattā ye pettivisayā cutā devesu paccājāyanti;
sn56.129-130:4.2: atha kho eteva bahutarā sattā ye pettivisayā cutā niraye paccājāyanti … pe …
sn56.129-130:4.3: evameva kho, bhikkhave, appakā te sattā ye pettivisayā cutā devesu paccājāyanti;
sn56.129-130:4.4: atha kho eteva bahutarā sattā ye pettivisayā cutā tiracchānayoniyā paccājāyanti … pe ….
